category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Members of this user group can use any character in posts, regardless of anti-spam restrictions.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Activates the AntiSpam Extended Plugin. It checks new posts from users with few posts, if they contain non-ascii characters so that they can be checked e.g. first by a moderator.
If the user has more posts than the number specified here, the check no longer applies. If the value is set to 0, this option is disabled.
What should happen to the posts, deactivate them, trash them or delete them. New Threads get anyway just deactivated.
A comma-separated list of additional characters that should be allowed.
A comma-separated list of characters and words to block.
